title: Test Technician
description:
• Electronics Diagnostics and Testing at Component level
  • Completion and documentation of set test routines
  • Eligibility for SC Clearance

Electronics Technician
Location: Glenrothes
Job Type: Permanent
Salary: £35,000 to £40,000 DOE
Industry: Specialist Electronics Manufacturer
Must be eligible for SC Clearance

What we can offer you

Up to 27 days holiday* + bank holidays, up to 10% ER pension contribution, 6x Life Assurance, Bonus Scheme

About the opportunity

Are you up to the challenge of working for a world-leading Aerospace and Defence business, who truly value their employees, whilst being a trusted provider of high quality and reliable equipment and solutions for Weapons, Sensors, Cyber, Space and Training industries.

Deliverables
  • Diagnosis of electronic equipment at component level
  • Functional testing of electronic assemblies
  • Configuration, utilistation and documentation of Electronic test equipment
Person Requirements
  • Minimum HNC in Electronics-related field
  • Minimum 1 years’ experience in relevant electronic testing field
  • Ability to obtain SC Clearance
Tags

Electronics Test, PCBs, Circuit Boards, DFM, DFT, NPI, Functional Testing, Electronics Diagnosis
  • Holiday entitlement starts at 25, rising to 27 with long service

This company is an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. They do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
